text: They'll be clapping the man who plays a straight theodolite next. EICHMANN continues to reveal the extraordinary watertight divisions of the German mind. Not content with arguing that he was only an efficient cog in the machine, he now claims that his part of the endless massacre that led to the death of six million Jews was "decent, feasible and workable."
